data.actual_result: The app doesn't and will always show a red notification badge from where the ping was until you view it from a PC or laptop
data.expected_result: The app should remember you saw the ping
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you are signed out of every single device for your Discord account except for your Android device - Join a really active server that's really huge, possibly 24,000 members, if you are in Hypesquad that server will work - Wait for someone (Mallory) to do an @ everyone - View the ping them switch back to another server or DM - Click the Menu button and close Discord - Launch Discord again
